35d42462-98fc-45ed-ac0c-bc728e1d2e83.description: This badge recognizes the achievement of the Cohesity Sales Associate accreditation. Earners of this badge are able to articulate the Cohesity vision, understand the problems that Cohesity solves, explain the product capabilities, and learn to position Cohesity.
35d42462-98fc-45ed-ac0c-bc728e1d2e83.name: Sales Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Cohesity Sales Professional learning track.
Pass the Cohesity Sales Professional accreditation exam.

b02cf9ae-d77f-43dc-b52e-13f17bbbcf3c.description: This badge recognizes the achievement of the Cohesity Technical Sales Associate accreditation. Earners of this badge are knowledgeable about product positioning, how to whiteboard Cohesity concepts, Helios Data Management Platform system internals, operating platforms, and platform best practices.
b02cf9ae-d77f-43dc-b52e-13f17bbbcf3c.name: Technical Sales Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Cohesity Technical Sales Associate learning track.
Pass the Cohesity Technical Sales Associate accreditation exam.

d5675d04-406c-4e01-96fe-e1bea97667dd.description: This badge recognizes attendance at Cohesity’s inaugural global conference, Cohesity Connect. Engagement at this event provides insight into exciting new trends and next-gen innovations in data management. Attendees participated in sessions led by industry experts, business and IT leaders, and networked with data management professionals.
d5675d04-406c-4e01-96fe-e1bea97667dd.name: Cohesity Connect Conference Attendee

badge_template_activities.title: Participation includes inspiring keynotes, new product announcements, and valuable sessions.

a57c8a4f-c8d2-4855-af1f-98db1b31e3d9.description: This badge recognizes the achievement of the Cohesity Competency Based Interviewing. Earners of this badge have the knowledge to understand the importance of hiring agility, how to rate scorecards effectively and how to conduct effective debrief meetings. They also understand interviewing and have knowledge of best practices and expectations. Lastly they all understand Interviewing Biases and ways to reduce them in our hiring process.
a57c8a4f-c8d2-4855-af1f-98db1b31e3d9.name: Competency Based Interviewing

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Competency Based Interviewing eCourse.

84845264-a192-4c87-963c-415d6de06717.description: The Cohesity Platform Foundations is a prerequisite, eLearning training course that covers an overview of Cohesity solutions, technologies and the overall platform (or an introduction to the GUI). In this course you will learn about the Cohesity Helios Platform components & services, the different license types, the file system, and Cohesity DataProtect services such as backup, recovery and test/dev capabilities.
84845264-a192-4c87-963c-415d6de06717.name: Cohesity Platform Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Cohesity Platform Fundamentals eCourse

9606f93d-afa1-4726-9e95-b27cfab41899.description: Earners of this badge recognizes the achievement of passing the Cohesity DMaaS Sales Associate, which focuses on ensuring individuals are knowledgeable in the foundational concepts of DMaaS (Data Management as a Service). The exam requires the successful candidate demonstrates knowledge of DMaaS value props, use cases, financial selling, and competitive positioning in order to have initial conversations with customers.
9606f93d-afa1-4726-9e95-b27cfab41899.name: Cohesity Data Management as a Service Sales Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Cohesity DMaaS Sales Associate Exam
Recommended course: Selling DMaaS (Data Management as a Service)

cace31e4-3bbd-4106-ae30-9ed6a8286643.description: Completion of the Cohesity Sizing and Web Sizing Tool eCourse helps learners to learn basic terms and acronyms used in the sizing process. Learners will gain an understanding of Cohesity sizing concepts and basic architecture. Badge holders have gained the knowledge to use the Cohesity Web sizing tool based on collected customer data.
cace31e4-3bbd-4106-ae30-9ed6a8286643.name: Cohesity Sizing and Web Sizing Tool

badge_template_activities.title: Cohesity Sizing and Web Sizing Tool

b78e7ae8-4ffb-40ff-b64c-91bf1139bf0f.description: This badge recognizes the achievement of the Cohesity Technical Sales Data Protection Associate accreditation. Earners of this badge have the knowledge, skills, and expertise in the deployment of Cohesity DataProtect, including installation, configuration, troubleshooting, and management. They also understand the DataProtect architecture and requirements around implementation project planning.
b78e7ae8-4ffb-40ff-b64c-91bf1139bf0f.name: Technical Sales Data Protection Associate

badge_template_activities.title: This badge recognizes the achievement of the Cohesity Technical Sales Data Protection Associate accreditation.
This badge recognizes the achievement of the Cohesity Technical Sales Data Protection Associate accreditation.

075059a3-0544-4227-b4c4-4b79d1f5875c.description: This badge recognizes the achievement of passing the Cohesity Data Protection Associate exam, which focuses on ensuring individuals are knowledgeable in Cohesity DataProtect concepts and terminology. The exam requires the successful candidate to demonstrate the ability to administer and monitor the Cohesity platform, and covers concepts and administration for data protection as well as reporting, replication, archival, and using file and object services for storing backup data.
075059a3-0544-4227-b4c4-4b79d1f5875c.name: Cohesity Certified Data Protection Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Cohesity Data Protection Associate certification exam.

67085eee-6116-4ecc-b8eb-3a47843d4a26.description: Earn this badge to demonstrate your knowledge of marketing with Cohesity. To earn the badge, the individual must have completed the course and passed the corresponding exam. Course topics include: Introduction to Cohesity, tools for marketing, how to build a demand generation kit and managing market development funds (MDF).
67085eee-6116-4ecc-b8eb-3a47843d4a26.name: Cohesity Marketing Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Marketing Fundamentals Course and pass the Cohesity accreditation exam.

59035ccb-658d-4805-9ebf-f1b43261739e.description: Earners of this badge recognizes the achievement of passing the Cohesity Service Provider Operator exam, which focuses on ensuring individuals are knowledgeable in administration, understanding and support of the Multi-Tenant aspects of the Cohesity DataPlatform. The exam requires the successful candidate to demonstrate the ability to administer, monitor and fully support the Cohesity platform, and covers concepts and administration for BaaS, DRaaS, FaaS, Multi-Cloud use cases and reporting.
59035ccb-658d-4805-9ebf-f1b43261739e.name: Service Provider Operator Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Core Operator eCourse.

bcec5197-8805-4772-9e57-a1ced48246f9.description: This badge recognizes the achievement of the individual in becoming certified in Cohesity Installation. dc0cef00-db3c-40c8-bb67-d295af4a581d.description: Earners of this badge recognize the achievement of passing the Cohesity Data Security Sales Associate exam, which focuses on ensuring individuals are knowledgeable in the foundational concepts of Data Security. 4c43ce79-345a-45f0-b1c1-67328904dfeb.description: Earning this badge recognizes the achievement of passing the Cohesity SmartFiles Sales Associate, which focuses on ensuring individuals are knowledgeable in the foundational concepts of SmartFiles. c64202c3-ccb1-497b-9955-b6b97e223ddb.description: This badge recognizes the achievement of passing the Cohesity Multicloud Solutions Associate certification exam, which focuses on ensuring individuals are knowledgeable in how to successfully use and deploy the Cohesity platform in and with multicloud environments. f9d184d4-03b6-460f-a31a-5fbdf35a7136.description: This badge recognizes the completion of the Cohesity Data Management Associate certification track, which requires passing the Data Protection, File and Object Services, and Multicloud Solutions Associate certification exams. fbb3f0f8-9af3-430e-bd02-e033a884a996.description: In addition to skills obtained from Level 1, Level 2 Cohesity Champions have demonstrated skills in executing a successful live demonstration of the Cohesity DataProtect product while also reinforcing the messaging around Cohesity as a comprehensive data management platform.

29540a94-80c9-44ca-a668-cf78e05edfb4.description: In addition to skills obtained from Level 1, 2, & 3, Level 4 Cohesity Champions are able to effectively design, develop, execute, and defend a proof-of-concept (PoC) project to help win a customer opportunity.
